page.title: 06Health-Gleadless Valley
page.content: At Gleadless Valley school we have a health education programme for our students.This includes advice on preventative dental care-the Natural Nashers Project, and a Food and Health Project which is based on the findings of the NACNE Report published in 1983.We are also very concerned about food labelling and the contents of processed foods.We have investigated the labels and contents of many brands of commercial yoghurt and compared them with our own home-made variety.We have found that many contain a lot of refined sugar and other additives which are put in for the sake of appearance rather than nutrition.We also found,not suprisingly, that most students preferred sweetened yoghurt with added colouring rather than home-made yoghurt flavoured with fresh fruit though some said they liked it.
